Organizers.Name: Mohamed Faizal
Organizers.Description: Mohamed Faizal, Technology Specialist. Microsoft. High achieving, persuasive, adaptable & innovative problem solver with 20 years of experience with MNCs like Microsoft, Cognizant, Dimension Data & NCS. Specialist in consultative selling, pre-sales, alliances and partnership building.

Organizers.Name: Puneet Ghanshani
Organizers.Description: Puneet, Senior Architect at Microsoft, is responsible for engaging with Microsoft's customers for Presales/Delivery and providing thought and technical leadership to improve their technology landscape using Artificial Intelligence tools/frameworks on Azure and streamline their DevOps processes. He has spoken in over 30 conferences on topics related to .NET and Azure, authored over 25 articles in international journals, a book on advanced C to his name, and has contributed to many open source projects on GitHub. Prior to joining Microsoft, he was also MVP on Microsoft Azure and .NET technologies.

Organizers.Name: Sakthis Kumar
Organizers.Description: Sakthis is Microsoft Azure MVP with 18+ years of experience primarily on Microsoft Technologies and passionate about Cloud Computing, Cloud Security.

Organizers.Name: Senthamil Selvan
Organizers.Description: Microsoft Windows Dev MVP. Have experience in developing apps for windows platform. Developed several UWP apps and currently working on HoloLens apps.

Speaker.Name: Mayur Tendulkar
Speaker.Description: Mayur Tendulkar is Program Manager on Xamarin team at Microsoft, working from Pune, India. Before joining Microsoft, since 2013, he was awarded as Microsoft Most Valuable Professional on Windows Development and worked as Developer Evangelist with Xamarin. He is writing mobile applications since the days of Windows Mobile 5.0 and love to talk about everything mobile. You can find him talking at conferences, user groups and on various social channels. His co-ordinates are @mayur_Tendulkar and for git: mayur-tendulkar. You can follow his thoughts on his blog: http://mayurtendulkar.com

Sessions.Title: Designing and Deploying Microservices Architecture on Azure

Speaker.Name: Wely Lau
Speaker.Description: Wely Lau (Technology Specialist, Azure Cloud App Dev, APAC)Wely is developer, architect, trainer, consultant, technical writer, and technology lover. He currently works as Technology Specialist on Azure Application Development Platform for Microsoft Asia Pacific.Before joining Microsoft, he was 5 years Azure MVP and was the first Azure MVP in Southeast Asia.

Sessions.Title: Using Azure Functions and Logic App to monitor and trade Cryptocurrencies

Speaker.Name: Tan Chun Siong
Speaker.Description: Microsoft

Sessions.Title: You only code once, the Bot

Speaker.Name: Sohel Shekha
Speaker.Description: Sohel Shekha has been developing Business Solutions for Security, E-commerce, Healthcare and Retail industry for past 7 years. He is Microsoft MVP and currently works as Tech Lead for Halza. His interest lies in Cyber Security, Mobile Apps and .Net Technologies, in his free time he likes to write on Quora and has been featured as 'Most Viewed Writer' for Xamarin.

Sessions.Title: Architecting Domain Driven Development for Microservices using Azure Kubernetes Service and .NET Core

Speaker.Name: Riza Marhaban
Speaker.Description: Riza Marhaban is a Cloud/Software Solution Architect, he is also a developers advocate and Full-Stack .NET Developer and former Microsoft Technical Evangelist at Microsoft. Riza is a long time 20+ years’ experience in IT, developing on Microsoft Technologies as well as Open Source Software. He loves following disruptive technologies and ideas, the market changes and the fluctuations of technologies. He also likes to talk about it. With a background in Mechanical Engineering that specialize in Robotics, Mechatronics, Automation, he currently also plays around with Mobile development and IoT. Twitter: @rizamarhaban, Website: rizamarhaban.com

Sessions.Title: You chose Microsoft Azure, but What’s Next?

Speaker.Name: Milton Goh
Speaker.Description: Microsoft CDM MVP. Milton is the industry hybrid guy who loves getting involve with hybrid stuffs. He started off as a Software Developer in Visual Basic programming in his career.

Sessions.Title: Modernize application development with highly scalable architecture using Docker & Azure cloud

Speaker.Name: Nilesh Gule
Speaker.Description: Architect with 15 years of industry expereince in multiple domains including Finance, Retail & Healthcare. Active blogger. Bigdata and cloud technologies enthusiasts. Exploring containers and orchestrators with focus on Docker & Kubernetes. Technology is my passion & Striving for excellence is my motto.

Speaker.Name: Anand
Speaker.Description: As a Cloud Solution Architect with Microsoft, Anand's current role involves enabling partners & customers to envision, design and deploy the right Microsoft Azure solutions to meet their exact needs. Apart from Microsoft Azure, his areas of expertise include Directory Services, Virtualization, Private and Hybrid clouds. With 13+ years in Microsoft and a wide range of experience over 20 years in the industry, he has been assisting partners & customers in rapidly finding solutions to their technology challenges.

Speaker.Name: Thuan Nguyen
Speaker.Description: Thuan is a Microsoft MVP since 2011 with nearly 10 years  experiences extensively on Microsoft stack. Thuan is passionate about software product and security engineering on cloud. He is now focusing on developing Practical Transformation Framework and Methodology for Datacenter, Large-scale and Mass Migration to Microsoft Azure

Speaker.Name: Kenneth Ham
Speaker.Description: Kenneth Ham is a Microsoft Azure MVP. Kenneth graduated from the National University of Singapore in Computer Science specializing in Software Engineering and Multimedia Information Retrieval. He is passionate about learning new technologies and has a 10+ years of IT experiences, diversifying across Software Engineering, AI, DevOps, and in particular, cloud focused in developing & architecting cloud solutions on Microsoft Azure.

Speaker.Name: Yinghao Li
Speaker.Description: Working at Microsoft Global Black Belt team for Azure Networking. Presales consultant for Azure Great China Region and South East Asia Region.10 years networking experience at Cisco/Mellanox/Microsoft.

Sessions.Title: Building scalable distributed apps using an Azure CosmosDB

Speaker.Name: Saranya Sriram
Speaker.Description: Saranya is a Cloud Solution Architect Lead in APAC Partner’s organization at Microsoft, leading a team of CSAs to help Partners migration applications and solutions into Azure platform. Saranya, herself is a technical enthusiast and hands on various parts of Application innovation and development. She is  a regular speaker at Microsoft Summits, keynote speaker demos, and speakers at Tech Summit, as well as a variety of 3rd party cloud events and conferences, specifically she has been presenting in Global Azure Bootcamp consecutively for 5 years now.

Sessions.Title: Building and Operationalizing your Data Integration Workflow at Scale in the Cloud

Speaker.Name: Shirley Wang
Speaker.Description: Shirley Wang is a Principal PM Manager working on Azure Data Factory.  Having been part of Microsoft Data Group for the last 16 years, Shirley has worked on SQL Server performance, SQL upgrade and migration tooling, Azure SQL Data Sync, and now ADF, a fully-managed data integration service in Azure.

Sessions.Title: Azure SQL Database Administration and Management

Speaker.Name: Ben Ishiyama-Levy
Speaker.Description: Director - Xamariners, Microsoft & Xamarin MVP.  Ben is an Agile Technologist / Serial Entrepreneur with teratons of hands on in IT management, architecture, scrummatology, cucumberism, rock'n'roll and anything fun and trending. He is the Director at Xamariners where he orchestrates the baking of tasty app, and likes to make up funky recipes. He leads the .Net Mobile Developers User group in Singapore, and speaks about Xamarin internationally.He does not usually speaks in the third person.
